inclusion.criterion: NAFLD activity score (NAS) ≥4 with ≥1 in each component
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: significant alcohol consumption for a period of more than 3 consecutive months within 1 year prior to screening
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Recent antibiotic use within 3 months or need for chronic antibiotic therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of drugs historically associated with NAFLD or drugs known to improve NASH
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday, developed abdominal pain followed by bloating and nausea as well as loose bowel movements. V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.
